channel.title: Python on Lisa's Profile
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Lisa's Profile

item.title: Time Journal: Automated Personal Informatics via Google Calendar
item.description: A Python-based analytics tool that synchronizes with Google Calendar API to visualize weekly time allocation through data visualization.

item.title: The Annoying Alarm
item.description: A Raspberry Pi-based innovative alarm system that forces cognitive and physical engagement through modular Python architecture and sensor fusion.
